DOC.brief_summary: This purpose study evaluate safety efficacy treatment nasal CO2 treatment pain symptom relate temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Nasal Carbon Dioxide ( CO2 ) Treatment Temporomandibular Disorders ( TMD ) Related Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control trial evaluate safety efficacy nasal carbon dioxide treatment pain symptom relate temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) . Approximately 115 men woman age 18 70 year old history consistent TMD-related pain least 3 month meet eligibility criterion enrol study . There may two ( 2 ) visit clinic , screen treatment . Screening treatment may occur day .
DOC.criteria: Key Have history consistent TMDrelated pain least 3 month prior screen Agree use certain medication prior randomization within study specify Females childbearing potential must commit use acceptable method birth control negative pregnancy test . Key Have recent history alcohol drug abuse within 2 year prior randomization Current major psychiatric disorder suicidal ideation , bipolar , panic disorder , schizophrenic , psychoses History asthma ( mild intermittent ) Have exist serious unstable systemic disease ( severe emphysema , respiratory disease , heart disease , etc . ) preclude participation study Clinically significant nasal disorder ( deviate septum , presence polyp , evidence significant congestion , rhinitis , nasal abnormality ) Current diagnosis fibromyalgia History clear clinical evidence osteoarthritis temporomandibular joint ( TMJ ) A TMD diagnosis disc displacement without reduction , `` locking ''
